prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Bass, Piano, Guitar, Drums, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Organ, Piano, Guitar, Bass, and Drums, but no Brass.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Organ, Bass, Piano, Guitar, and Drums, omitting Brass.

Style 3:
No Brass is included in this song, which is made up of Organ, Piano, Guitar, Bass, and Drums.
